text: (Kumbuchilani) katema kajwawechete Allah kuti: “E mmwe Isa! Chisimutu Une chinan'jigale ni kunkwesya Kukwangu, soni chinanswejesye ku wandu makafili, ni chinaatende wandu wankuyiye kuwa pachanya pa wandu makafili mpaka lisiku lya Kiyama. Kaneko Kukwangu nikwakuujila kwenu ni tinjijiilanya chilikati chenu mu ichindu yamwaliji nkulekangana.”
